d1: The title of the pie chart is 'Woman in poverty: family composition of household'.
d2: The pie chart shows the percentage of different types of women in terms of marital status and having dependent children, with each category represented by a different color.

insight1.insightSentence: Single women with no dependent children make up the majority of the data, accounting for 54% of the total.

data: 0.54, Single women with no dependent children
subInsights.phrases: Single women with no dependent children make up the majority

insight2.insightSentence: The proportion of married women with dependent children is slightly higher than that of married women with no dependent children.

data: 0.08, Married women with no dependent children
subInsights.phrases: The proportion of married women with dependent children is slightly higher than that of married women with no dependent children
